data.price: 24. Abaisse vers eux, par miséricorde, l’aile de l’humilité[287] et dis : « Seigneur, veuille leur accorder miséricorde, comme ils m’ont élevé tout petit ! »
data.arabic: وَٱخۡفِضۡ لَهُمَا جَنَاحَ ٱلذُّلِّ مِنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَةِ وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱرۡحَمۡهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيرٗا
data.footnotes: [287] L’image de l’aile abaissée revient pour exprimer la tendresse, toute humble et toute profonde, que l’on doit à ses parents.

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'fiḍ lahumā janāḥa al-dhuli mina al-raḥmati waqul rabbi ir'ḥamhumā kamā rabbayānī ṣaghīran
translations: Have mercy on both of them

dua.name: Dua for Parental Blessing
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine mercy and compassion for parents, emphasizing respect, love, and spiritual support for one's elders.

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.
